text: Todd Duffey (born Robert Gordon Duffey; April 9, 1974) is an American actor. He was born in Raleigh, North Carolina and grew up in Texas where he studied and performed in theater. ==Career== Duffey is best known for being Brian, the Chotchkie's waiter in the 1999 comedy Office Space. He also had a regular role in 2001 in Buffy the Vampire Slayer. == References ==
title: Todd Duffey
